name: Valereach Defenders
description:
This game was designed to be a one switch multiplayer game and that each player would have a one switch device. Navigate through the menu by clicking any button and hold the button to select. If you are connecting one switch buttons please key bind them to the below keys otherwise feel free to use a keyboard.

A - Player 1

S - Player 2

D - Player 3

F - Player 4

Press and hold a button in game to pause and then hold for 5 seconds to return to the menu.
